mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_sale( id, commodity_id, commodity_amount, sale_way, sale_price, final_price, pre_price, sale_style, sale_date, artist_id, create_date, creator, update_date, modifier, del_flag) VALUES( #{id}, #{commodityId}, #{commodityAmount}, #{saleWay}, #{salePrice}, #{finalPrice}, #{prePrice}, #{saleStyle}, #{saleDate}, #{artistId}, #{createDate}, #{creator}, #{updateDate}, #{modifier}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE sys_sale
commodity_id = #{commodityId},
commodity_amount = #{commodityAmount},
sale_way = #{saleWay},
sale_price = #{salePrice},
final_price = #{finalPrice},
pre_price = #{prePrice},
sale_style = #{saleStyle},
sale_date = #{saleDate},
modifier = #{modifier},
update_date = #{updateDate}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select s.*,c.commodity_name,c.commodity_num,p.way_name,a.artist_name from sys_sale s left join sys_commodity c on s.commodity_id = c.id left join sys_plat p on s.sale_way = p.id left join sys_artist a on s.artist_id = a.id where s.id = #{id}
select sum(sale_price) from sys_sale WHERE del_flag=0 and artist_id=#{artistId}
select sum(final_price) from sys_sale WHERE del_flag=0 and artist_id=#{artistId}
select sum(commodity_amount) from sys_sale WHERE del_flag=0 and artist_id=#{artistId}
select sum(commodity_amount) from sys_sale WHERE del_flag=0 and commodity_id=#{commodityId}

from sys_sale s WHERE s.del_flag = 0 and s.artist_id=#{artistId}

select sum(case when s.sale_date between DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -6 MONTH) and DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -5 MONTH) then s.final_price else 0 end) month6, sum(case when s.sale_date between DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -5 MONTH) and DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -4 MONTH) then s.final_price else 0 end) month5, sum(case when s.sale_date between DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -4 MONTH) and DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -3 MONTH) then s.final_price else 0 end) month4, sum(case when s.sale_date between DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -3 MONTH) and DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -2 MONTH) then s.final_price else 0 end) month3, sum(case when s.sale_date between DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -2 MONTH) and DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) then s.final_price else 0 end) month2, sum(case when s.sale_date between DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) and DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -0 MONTH) then s.final_price else 0 end) month1 from sys_sale s WHERE s.del_flag = 0 and s.artist_id=#{artistId}

select p.way_name platName, sum(s.sale_price) saleMoney, sum(s.final_price) FinallyMoney from sys_sale s left join sys_plat p on s.sale_way = p.id WHERE s.del_flag = 0 and s.artist_id=#{artistId} GROUP BY s.sale_way

select sum(case when s.sale_date between DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -6 MONTH) and DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -5 MONTH) then s.commodity_amount else 0 end) smonth6, sum(case when s.sale_date between DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -5 MONTH) and DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -4 MONTH) then s.commodity_amount else 0 end) smonth5, sum(case when s.sale_date between DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -4 MONTH) and DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -3 MONTH) then s.commodity_amount else 0 end) smonth4, sum(case when s.sale_date between DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -3 MONTH) and DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -2 MONTH) then s.commodity_amount else 0 end) smonth3, sum(case when s.sale_date between DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -2 MONTH) and DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) then s.commodity_amount else 0 end) smonth2, sum(case when s.sale_date between DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH) and DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -0 MONTH) then s.commodity_amount else 0 end) smonth1 from sys_sale s WHERE s.del_flag = 0 and s.artist_id=#{artistId}
